original_text: Now when the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these words, they were greatly perplexed about them, wondering what this would come to.
korean_text: 성전 맡은 자와 제사장들이 이 말을 듣고 의혹하여 이 일이 어찌 될까 하더니

sentences.original_text: Now when the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these words
sentences.korean_translation: 성전 막대관과 대제사장들이 이 말들을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they were greatly perplexed about them
wondering what this would come to
